metadata.title: CVE-2019-5796 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Data race in extensions guest view in Google Chrome prior to 73.0.3683.75allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
